title: Login to the app, Says i don't have beta access
body:
Signed up after receiving this email
Hi lekkers,

TL;DR We recently announced that we need beta testers for the Android version of the League Friends mobile app. You're one of the few players we're inviting!

If you’ve got access to an Android device running 4.1.1 or newer (API 16) and are willing to help us test this beta as well as future updates, sign up for the League Friends app beta using the button below. Note: Only players who received this invite from us will be able to sign into the beta app and participate in the test, so forwarding the link to a friend won’t get them into the beta.

Members of the beta will be expected to report any bugs and give general feedback about the app—this can be done by visiting the settings tab in the app and selecting "Bugs and Feedback." Discussions about the beta can be held on the OCE mobile app discussion board.

logged in and it says i don't have beta access after becomign a tester on google play

"You are a tester"

Running 4.1.1 on a Note 4

replies.body: Update - This has been solved but players will need to log out of the app and log back in. When they are denied access in the app there is a button to sign out directly from there. Once this happens and they log in again it should work. Sorry about the hassle. Let me know if there are any other issues or anything I can clarify.
@Maraudaur could you give an estimate when the League friends app and Clubs will be available to the public?
Sometime in 2016 =)
Im in :D !

All clear on my end, logged in fine.
Cheers Maraudaur!
Same here :D

Same here {{item:3070}}  rip
Hopefully it'll get fixed very soon. Can't wait to test it.
Woo! Im excited hahahha

In the email is says that we'll receive an update after installation and that it might take a few hours to receive the update. Could this be the reason we are all getting the same issue with not being able to log in?

Hey Guys,

I reread the email and it mentions that we'll receive an update for the Beta testing shortly.

I figure we hang tight for the team to push through the Beta platform access, seeing as though we've only recently gotten the email (a few hours ago for me)

We'll most likely receive a notification on our phones (if you've selected auto updates for apps) to update the app within the next 24 hours or so :)

Hey guys,

We are aware of the issue and are investigating now! will keep you updated.

Also receiving the same issue.

Love the idea though, just can't log in haha.
I have the same issue.

Yep, same here. Got the email, joined the testing program, downloaded the app, says I don't have access.

Edit: Working now, looks good!
unable to sign in. :(

logged in but....now saying unable to login to chat (make sure you have a valid summoner.)

Also trying to add a friend and comes up with a red bar and says (opps something broke) and then crashes have to relog in.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Same for me D:
got the email but can't sign in either
{{item:3070}} Receiving same error. {{item:3070}}
I have this same issue

http://imgur.com/a/X9OVj

Heeeeere
